column1: #Text=Azula says : " My brother and my uncle have disgraced the Fire Lord , and have brought shame on all of us .
#Text=" Azula says : " I 'm sorry , captain , but I do not know much about the tides .
#Text=" Captain says : " Of course , Your Highness .
#Text=" Azula says : " Do the tides command this ship ?
#Text=" Captain says : " I 'm afraid I do n't understand .
#Text=" Azula says : " You said the tides would not allow us to bring the ship in .
#Text=" Azula says : " And if I were to have you thrown overboard , would the tides think twice about smashing you against the rocky shore ?
#Text=" Azula says : " Well then , maybe you should worry less about the tides who have already made up their mind about killing you , and worry more about me , who 's still mulling it over .
#Text=" Captain says : " I 'll pull us in .
